alert.note: Alert for Hillsborough; Rockingham (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 08 at 3:10PM EDT until September 08 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Gray Maine has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Rockingham County in southern New Hampshire... Southeastern Hillsborough County in southern New Hampshire... * Until 415 PM EDT. * At 309 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southeast of Salem, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Portsmouth, Hampton, Durham, Exeter, Kittery, Salem, Epping, Brentwood, Greenland, Newington, Seabrook, Rye, Stratham, Newmarket, Pelham, Hampstead, Atkinson, Kingston, Danville, and Fremont. This includes the following highways... Interstate 93 between mile markers 0 and 3. Interstate 95 in New Hampshire between mile markers 0 and 15. This also includes... Hampton Beach. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
